description: These Ukrainian pork meatballs have a secret ingredient to keep them super juicy: Bread soaked in milk! These are delicious with mashed potatoes for a hearty meal.
name: Juicy Pork Meatballs With Mashed Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tear the bread into pieces and add to a bowl. Soak in the milk for 10 minutes and mash well. Mix the pork, onion and potato in medium bowl and stir in the soaked bread, salt, pepper, egg and garlic.
Roll the mix into 16 meatballs with your hands. Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C.
Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the meatballs for 2-3 minutes on each side until lightly golden.
Place the seared meatballs in a baking dish and pour over 70ml of boiling water. Bake for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
